Pre-Game Insights: The Arizona Diamondbacks will look to even the World Series score against the Texas Rangers, with both teams planning bullpen games.
Andrew Heaney will start for the Rangers, while rookie Joe Mantiply will start for the D-backs.
In postseason play, Max Scherzer has pitched in 6.0 innings for a 6.00 ERA (1.50 WHIP) with one strikeout, while Mantiply has a 4.26 ERA in 6.1 innings pitched (1.26 WHIP) with five strikeouts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will start at 6:03 pm on Fox.
Others: The Texas Rangers took a 2-1 lead over the Arizona Diamondbacks in the World Series last night.
